attributes.action: Implement the Sharia law in UK
attributes.background: The sharia law is not unfair or unjust in any way, many people are quick to write it off but that is because they don't understand the full concept and rules of the sharia law. Sharia law should be taught by knowledgeable Muslims to the government and then be implemented.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the law and the legal system to be changed.
